name: Samsara - Stones of Eternity
description:
** TGS 2018 Indie House Official Selection **
** BICFest 2017 Official Selection **

Whatever game you imagine, it is not. It is a brand new, super addictive, and most advanced 3x3 puzzle game. Of course, there is a 6x6, also.

Rules:

Touch and Cycle tiles.
0 -> 1 -> 2 -> 3 -> 0 ...

You can only touch once to change a tile. Linked tiles change together!

3 consecutive tiles with the same number will explode!


Features:

• Three unique game modes for 3x3 board
• Three unique game modes for 6x6 board with Ghosts and Items
• Two additional themes you can unlock for free
• Three game modes for Apple Watch is also available for free
